title: The Art of Animal Drawing - Hultgren, Ken - Mobi/Epub/PDF_(K-Sle
description: Former Disney animator offers expert advice on drawing animals both realistically and as caricatures. Use of line, brush technique, establishing mood, conveying action, much more. Construction drawings reveal development process in creating animal figures.
